titleStmt.title: Dispatch from William H. Thomas, March 20, 1883

bibl.title: Dispatch from William H. Thomas
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

correspAction.roleName: Secretariat of Ministry of Foreign Affairs

div1.p: The authority of the island of Principe ask what destination shall be given to the objects mentioned int he accompanying report which were recently found among the effects of Jose Augusto Fonseca, deceased belonging to Domingos Leck Marchins who then filled the Offices of Vice Consul of the United States and of Brazil, of whom no news has been received since he left that island some years since. also to whom to deliver the said Marchins possesses in that island.

I have to ask Your Exy to inform me to whom the articles mentioned in the accompanying list are to be delivered, as well as the nationality of the above name Marchins in order to deliver the refund to.

Secretariat of Ministry of Foreign Affairs
18 Octr 1878
signed Joãs de Andra de Casso
